mapper.select: select K.* from(select * from qna) as K order by qrenum desc, qstep asc limit #{param1},#{param2}
mapper.update: update qna set qcount = qcount+1 where qnum=#{qnum}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qnum, userid, qtitle, qcontent, qdate, qstep, qrenum) value(#{qnum}, #{userid}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, now(), 0, #{qrenum})
mapper.update: update qna set qstep=qstep+1 where qrenum=#{qrenum} and qstep > #{qstep}
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qnum, userid, qtitle, qcontent, qdate, qstep, qrenum, qdepth) value(#{qnum}, #{userid}, #{qtitle}, #{qcontent}, now(), #{qstep}, #{qrenum}, #{qdepth})
